verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It was in a simple stable
All beaten and worn
Hardly a place
For a King to be born
He didnt chose a place special
To reveal His Majesty
So I know if I give Him control
He will be born in me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let Your word be born
in the manger of my heart
Let it live in me, let it start
Live inside this house of clay
and be molded every day
Let your word be born
in the manger of my heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now outwardly I am nothing
Not much to behold
not likely a place
For His Word to unfold
But if I'll just yield this vessel
And let Him have His way
From glory unto glory
He'll change me day by day
